text:
Valeria Valeri (born Valeria Tulli; 8 December 1921 – 11 June 2019) was an Italian actress. She was born in Rome. She appeared in theatre, movies, television and also dubbed in Italian. She is known for her roles in the movies "Adriana Lecouvreur" (1955), "Lo scippo" (1965), "Seasons of Our Love" (1966) and "Catherine and I" (1980). She later appeared in the series "Un medico in famiglia".
Valeri died on 11 June 2019 in Rome, at the age of 97.
